skillTree.localised_description: The dread steeds of Chaos are more than mere horses, but creatures tainted by Daemon blood, said to be gifts from the Dark Gods themselves.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit is branded with the Mark of Khorne, and is affected by Khorne Authority.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: A vast, mobile altar allows the souls of the slain to be ritualistically condemned directly from the field of slaughter.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit is branded with the Mark of Khorne, and is affected by Khorne Authority.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with each nearby entity death (300)

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: Fluttering and flouncing into battle is the way of the weak and self-indulgent. War should be waged Kharneth's way – with pure, unbridled savagery.

effects.description: Melee attack: +10 when fighting against Slaaneshi factions
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Slaaneshi factions
Ability number of uses: +1 for "Gate of Khorne"
Ability number of uses: +2 for "Gate of Khorne"

skillTree.localised_description: At times, this servant of Khorne storms across the battlefield with arrows lodged in his chest. However, they seem to do little but further stoke the raging fire of his wrath.
Few magics can worm their way through this one's skull; their Khornate collar offers adequate protection, as does the impenetrable, relentless fury infecting his mind.

effects.description:
Enemy fire resistance: -5%
	(enemy armies in region)

Enemy fire resistance: -10%
	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +10% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +20% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: When a huge swathe of rage and violence descends upon the unready, very few survivors are left in its wake.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

attributes.bullet_text: When attacking braced charge defenders, this unit only loses half of its charge bonus.

skillTree.localised_description: It takes a true warrior's will to halt the killing long enough for subtlety.
The slaughter starts long before the Daemons pour in.

effects.description: Spread Corruption action: Khorne corruption is increased by an additional 3

Daemons Reforged: +5% hit points for destroyed Daemons of Khorne units restored after battle
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "Kill, bleed, die. The blood flows!"
Among the hordes, even the lowliest are brutal warriors.

effects.description:
Armour: +10 for Marauders of Khorne, Skullreapers and Wrathmongers units
	(Hero's army)

Passive ability: "Rage" for Marauders of Khorne and Marauder Horsemen of Khorne units
	(Hero's army)

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee (150s)
Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee (150s)

skillTree.localised_description: What better training than an ambitious underling?

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 10% chance of wounding target

Character experience gain per turn: +200
	(accompanying Lord)

Enemy Hero action success chance: -10%
	(accompanying Lord)

skillTree.localised_description: Champions earn their exaltations in the heart of battle.
The warhost seeks glories for the Dark Gods, erecting perverse monuments to earn their favor.
All manner of terrible, twisted artifacts can be found.

effects.description:
Magic item drop chance from battle: +10%
	(accompanying Lord)

Magic item drop chance from battle: +20%
	(accompanying Lord)

Magic item drop chance from battle: +30%
	(accompanying Lord)

skillTree.localised_description: No price is too small for the Gods.

effects.description:
Character experience gain per turn: +50
	(own characters in region)

Character experience gain per turn: +100
	(own characters in region)

Character experience gain per turn: +150
	(own characters in region)

skillTree.localised_description: The southern races are weak. Their souls and monuments will be offered to the Gods in equal measure!

effects.description:
Attrition: -5% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(own armies in province)

Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(own armies in province)

Attrition: -15% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(own armies in province)

skillTree.localised_description: There is a price to all things, a cost which has been determined by the Gods and will be exacted from those with the courage to strike a deal.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve: +1 per turn

skillTree.localised_description: A legendary presence, on the battlefield and off.
You think a dagger in my back is going to kill me? Ha! It’s just going to make me mad.
It’s difficult to sleep with one eye open and a dagger under your pillow.
The soldiers hear the songs of the bard and know their champion fights on.
You’ll never survive a battle with footwork like that. Here, watch me.

effects.description:
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +1 when defending
	(Hero's army)

Armour-piercing weapon damage: +2 when defending
	(Hero's army)

Armour-piercing weapon damage: +3 when defending
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This is no time for rest and games; up, on your feet! We have work to do.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +200
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 6%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 9%

skillTree.localised_description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Spread Corruption action: Khorne corruption is increased by an additional 2
Spread Corruption action: Khorne corruption is increased by an additional 4
Spread Corruption action: Khorne corruption is increased by an additional 6

skillTree.localised_description: They cannot stop what they cannot see.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 1 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 2 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 3 additional wall breaches

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 15% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 30% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of a powerful figure extolling death and blasphemies can bring enemy ranks to their knees.

effects.description: Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -10%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -20%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -40%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

Ambush success chance: +20%
	(own armies in region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

related_attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.

Ambush defence chance: +10%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.

effects.description: Magic item drop chance from battle: +15%

backgroundSkills.localised_description: This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Well built, robust. Powerful.
Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

effects.description: Reinforcements supporting this army can have their arrival point adjusted by +500 metres without incurring any time penalty

Enemy battle reinforcement time: +10%
	(all units in army)

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
If you can swing, slash, stab or gouge, it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.
This one knows exactly what needs to be done to ensure that the Murder God gains advantage over His foes.
If you don't kill them outright, to spill their blood and scar them for life is almost as good.
"My hammer's a cold piece of blood-lethal steel. I grin while you writhe with the pain that I deal!"

related_attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any large attacker.
When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any attacker.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: If there's trouble to be had – and by that I mean the worst kind of slaughter – this one will always be at the centre of things, instigating the conflict.

effects.description:
Income from post-battle loot: +10%
	(own characters in province)
